games.title: TRAFFIC JAM ESCAPE 3D
games.description:
Clear the roads in Traffic Jam Escape 3D! Solve challenging traffic puzzles, free cars from gridlock, and master the art of strategic driving.

Get ready to play Traffic Jam Escape 3D, the addictive mobile traffic puzzle game where you control chaotic city streets and free cars from gridlock! Every second counts - one smart move can clear the road, one mistake can block it forever. Are you skilled enough to guide every car out of the jam?

In Traffic Jam Escape 3D, your goal is simple but challenging: tap cars, follow the arrows, and plan their path to freedom. Avoid collisions, dodge obstacles, and keep traffic moving smoothly. With each level, timing and strategy become even more important - one wrong move could create a crash and block the way.

Every stage offers a brand-new challenge. You’ll need to think ahead, plan the order of moves, and figure out the best escape route for each vehicle. From narrow alleys to busy intersections, the puzzles get tougher and more exciting as you progress.

Featuring a wide variety of vehicles - from tiny cars to large trucks - you’ll need to adapt your strategy to guide each one safely out of the mess. The more you play, the sharper your skills become as you conquer increasingly complex traffic jams.

Key Features of Traffic Jam Escape 3D:
Challenging traffic jam escape puzzles at every level
Intuitive tap-and-guide controls for all ages
Dynamic gameplay with busy intersections, narrow roads, and tricky obstacles
Dozens of levels with increasing difficulty to keep you hooked
Vibrant graphics and realistic sound effects for an immersive experience
Traffic Jam Escape isn’t just about clearing the streets—it’s about mastering the art of smart maneuvering. Dodge oncoming traffic, weave through tight spaces, and avoid obstacles at every turn. With dozens of levels to conquer, the game offers a constant challenge and endless fun.

Whether you’re solving quick car escape puzzles on the go or tackling more complex jam-packed streets at home, Traffic Jam Escape 3D delivers nonstop excitement and tests your problem-solving skills.

Ready to test your reflexes and strategic thinking? Take the driver’s seat in Traffic Jam Escape 3D today and see if you can clear the roads and guide every car to safety. Play now and experience the thrill of escaping the traffic jams!
games.howToPlayText: Tap cars to drive them out and clear the traffic jam! Collect gems to decorate your room, finish levels fast for more points, and use boosters like rockets or helicopters to beat tough stages.

games.title: Lady Rescue
games.description:
Welcome to Lady Rescue!, the perfect game for those who love drawing and solving puzzles!
Join our brave girl, Lady, on an exciting journey filled with challenging puzzles, honey bees, and lots of surprises. 
In this game, you need to help Lady escape from dangerous things like bees, sharks, and crocodiles by drawing lines. You have to think and act fast to keep her safe. 
It's not just fun, it's also a brain teaser that makes you think. You will find yourself in different situations where you need to use your smartness to draw a line that will save Lady.
games.howToPlayText:
- Touch and drag your finger to draw a line.
- Protect Lady within 5 seconds.
- Help her escape and move to the next level.

games.title: Slide Block Jam
games.description:
Slide Block Jam: The Ultimate Puzzle Adventure

Unleash your puzzle-solving skills in Slide Block Jam, the ultimate block puzzle game that will challenge your mind and keep you hooked for hours! In this captivating and strategically engaging game, your goal is simple: move colorful blocks to their matching colored doors to clear the way. However, each level introduces new obstacles and challenges, requiring you to think carefully and plan your moves to master every puzzle.

Endless Puzzles, Limitless Fun
Prepare yourself for puzzles designed to test both your logic and strategic thinking. As you progress, the levels become increasingly intricate and creative, keeping you engaged with new challenges at every turn. Whether you're sliding blocks to clear space or navigating through tough barriers, the thrill of solving each puzzle intensifies.
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play:
* Slide the blocks: Move the colorful blocks to their matching colored doors.
* Solve each puzzle: Plan your moves carefully to clear the path and complete the puzzle.
*Think strategically: Every level presents a new challenge, so use your wits to find the most efficient way to clear the blocks.
* Unlock new challenges: With each level you complete, new and more difficult obstacles open up, keeping the excitement going!

games.title: SORTY BOLTY
games.description: SORTY BOLTY revolves around the theme of organization and color coordination. Players are tasked with sorting vibrant nuts onto corresponding bolts, creating a visually satisfying and mentally stimulating experience. The game's appeal lies in its straightforward mechanics that gradually increase in complexity, challenging players to think several moves ahead.
games.howToPlayText:
1 step: Click/Tap on a bolt to select a nut
2 step: Click/Tap on another bolt with the same color (or empty) to collect nuts
Use the hints if you get stuck:
Cancel move - undoes the last step you made
Extra bolt - opens extra space for nuts

games.title: Run The Electricity
games.description:
Run The Electricity is a unique puzzle game that combines simplicity and benefits for your mind. It is designed to give relaxation, help to cope with stress and improve concentration.

Instead of intense gameplay and a race against time, a calm process awaits you here: you just need to connect lines, lamps and energy sources in a closed circuit to turn on the light.

Minimalistic design, smooth animation and soothing music create an atmosphere of complete tranquility comparable to yoga. This is not just a game, but a means to meditate and combat anxiety. You can play it at home, on the road, or at work to distract yourself and restore your mental balance.

Smart puzzles train logic and imagination, and simple mechanics allow you to have fun from the first seconds. Discover a world of light, harmony and tranquility!
games.howToPlayText:
Playing this game is easy and enjoyable. All you need to do is tap on the lines and turn them until you get a closed electrical circuit.

For the light to come on, at least one lamp and a wire must be connected in it. As soon as this happens, the lines will shine, and you will get a feeling of completeness and tranquility.

Each puzzle takes only a few seconds, but it brings a lot of fun. This makes the game ideal for short pauses, trips, or waiting. You don't have to rush: the levels are unlimited in time, and you can solve them at your own pace.

With each new stage, the tasks become more interesting and diverse, training concentration and attention. Conduct Electricity will help to cope with anxiety, give positive emotions and become an excellent anti-stress remedy. Just open the game, start connecting the lines, and feel your mind calm down.

games.title: Bridge Builder
games.description:
Become a design engineer who will have to improvise and, above all, adapt to the task at hand. Use different materials to build structures that can support the weight of the vehicle.

Game Features:

- Excellent physics - a real simulator
- Challenging levels in four different locations
- Challenging puzzles requiring the use of thinking and logic
- Built-in hint system will help you develop your skills
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop controls: 
Drag left click = build a bridge
Space = start simulation
Z = undo
Double left click to remove a bridge part

Mobile controls:
Use touchscreen and on-screen controls
